attributes.action: break off diplamatic ties with south africa for supporting the mugabe regime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with thousands of people suffering in zimbabwe aswell as persecution of members of the opposition party,south africa is doing nothing to help bring down the regime of robert mugabe except for "silent deplomacy"which obviously isnt working.its as though south africa is on the side of mugabe!
